CustomField.description: Filter what hospital visits are checked when counting up department visits.
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Filter what hospital visits are checked when counting up department visits. Provided as a formula in the following format:
ucinn_ascendv2__Admit_Date__c <= TODAY AND ucinn_ascendv2__Encounter_Type__c = 'Recurring'
CustomField.label: Hospital Visit Department Filter
